Game.Name: Pokémon Marble
Game.Plot: Your region now is GARNA and it is in Lowheaven. Everyone in this area knows the adventure of Ran and J.Akira. 20 years after that adventure, a new journey was made by a young trainer – it is you. You need to raise your Pokemon Level up, challenge with the best GYM Leaders. Then you have to protect everyone and save the world from the mafia. With the help from Professor Baro, you can do that.
